thought: To craft a stone_slab, I need to craft 3 stones first. I can craft a stone by smelting cobblestone. Therefore, I will smelt the cobblestone from slot 21 into an empty slot (eg., 11)
Ok
act: smelt from slot 21 to slot 11 with quantity 1
